special abilities.name: Bred for War
special abilities.description: A Cadian must attempt a Challenging (+0) Willpower Test to go against the rules of the Imperial Guard.

special abilities.name: Hated Enemy
special abilities.description: Cadians gain a Hatred talent. Characters may need to make an Ordinary (+10) Willpower Test to refrain from attacking their hated enemy.

special abilities.name: Fluency
special abilities.description: Catachans do not start with Linguistics (Low Gothic) at character creation.

special abilities.name: Survivalists (Jungles)
special abilities.description: Catachans have grown up fighting in the lethal jungle of their homeworld, and feel at home on any planet with a similar environment. When operating in jungle terrain, they can re-roll failed Survival and Navigate (Surface) Skill Tests.

special abilities.name: Wary of Outsiders
special abilities.description: Death worlders suffer a -10 penalty to Interaction Skill Tests in formal surroundings and impose a -10 penalty to Intervation Skill Tests on them by non-death worlders.

special abilities.name: Only One Life to Give
special abilities.description: Penitents must pass an Ordinary (+10) Willpower Test to retreat or act in the interests of self-preservation.

special abilities.name: Faceless, Nameless and Selfless
special abilities.description: Krieg Korpsmen are taught to regard themselves without identity, hidden behind gas masks and stripped of even their names. This lack of self helps them fight on against impossible odds, and neither fear nor doubt will hinder them. When required to make a Fear or Pinning Test, ignore all penalties applied to the Test, and simply treat it as a Challenging (+0) Willpower Test.

special abilities.name: Blessed Ignorance
special abilities.description: Elysians suffer a -5 penalty on all Forbitten Lore Tests.

special abilities.name: Demolitions
special abilities.description: The regiment gains a +10 bonus to Logistics tests to obtain grenades, missiles, explosives and special tank ammunition.

name: 9th Uhlans of the Death riders of Krieg
